about_the_game:
Expand your tactical options with two unique characters, Frank and Dr. Fred, each armed with their own powerful weapons and abilities.

Frank

Despite his wrathful and uncontrollable nature, Frank consistently proves himself to be one of the most exceptional rushers on the team. He is capable of enduring hits far beyond what others can handle, ultimately propelling the team forward.

Weapons

  • THORM
    Thorm is a powerful mid-range gun that bridges the gap between a rifle and an SMG, offering a balance of fire speed and power. It’s ideal for players who want to rush and dominate the game.
  • DEAGLE
    The Deagle has a low fire rate and small magazine, but it deals high damage and is effective at long distances, capable of taking down enemies even from afar.
  • AXE
    The Axe allows you to dominate enemies with its balanced speed and range, making it a reliable choice for close combat.

Ability

Frank's formidable rage not only enables him to endure a higher number of bullets but also mitigates the damage inflicted upon him, with each bullet's harmful impact reduced by half.

Dr. Fred

As an intellectual and a man of science, Dr. Fred has the capability to deceive his enemies through illusions of himself.

Weapons

  • SCORCHER
    The Scorcher is a gun with ideal damage and good aim speed, making it perfect for long-distance engagements. Its accuracy is average, but it excels at taking down enemies effectively.
  • SPARK
    The Spark boasts great accuracy with a 12-round magazine. You can add a silencer and other upgrades, making it an excellent choice for players who want to hit enemies without being exposed.
  • AXE
    The Axe allows you to dominate enemies with its balanced speed and range, making it a reliable choice for close combat.

Ability

Dr. Fred wields a remarkable ability to craft illusions, skillfully conjuring convincing images that deceive his adversaries, leaving them vulnerable and bewildered.
